name: The Longest Fetch
description:
Pitch: A corgi dog gets lost while trying to catch the ball his owner had thrown at him. He finds himself alone in an unknown area of the suburbs and must fight his way back home through wild dogs and other dangers. His ball is his only connection to home.

GGJ19 Theme: What home means to you.

"Home to us is where the loved ones are."

Information

The game is played from right to left (returning back home).

Jam Site: 
Edinburgh Global Game Jam

Jam Year: 
2019

Platforms: 
MS Windows, Mac OS X

Tools And Technologies: 
Unity (any product)
